name: Nitigya Kargeti
headline: System Builder — Data-Intensive Backend & Applied ML
profile: Engineer focused on scalable, low-latency data systems, AWS/GCP pipelines, and LLM-integrated applications. Shipped user-facing software at startup scale and co-authored peer-reviewed HCI work; comfortable owning services end-to-end from design to ops.

experience.company: People & Robots Lab (NSF-funded), University of Wisconsin–Madison
highlights: Built FastAPI microservices with WebSockets for robot-assisted learning; async MongoDB controllers trimmed median query latency by ~30%.
Authored a lightweight Misty II control library (REST/WebSocket, TTS) to replace a heavier ROS/Docker stack, cutting deployment overhead.
Implemented grounded LLM pipeline with JSON visual-context store and grade-level policy, improving factuality/age-appropriateness.
Designed multi-agent orchestration with RBAC & role-policy engine; operated production backend for an in-home study with 20 families.
Co-authored the CHI 2025 paper on parent-in-the-loop educational robotics; maintained research infra and mentored 3 undergrads.
Architected AWS serverless ETL (Lambda, SQS, S3) with DLQs/backoff; improved p95 latency by ~70% and reached 99.95% success rate.
Led one-click migration to Stripe Connected Accounts; moved 20k+ customer records with zero downtime.
Shipped multi-currency support with forward/backward DB migrations and structured logging for faster incident triage.

experience.company: Centre for Development of Advanced Computing (CDAC), Govt. of India
highlights: Designed a P300 speller pipeline that ingests real-time EEG + marker streams via Lab Streaming Layer (liblsl) and performs artifact-robust preprocessing (ICA/epoching).
Refactored Python prototype (MNE, py-lsl) into C++ with a lock-free ring buffer to stabilize async producer/consumer flows and reduce end-to-end latency.
Integrated binary classifier (SVM/NN) for online detection and UI feedback; validated live stream alignment and throughput on multi-channel EEG.

experience.company: Defence Research & Development Organisation (DRDO) — DEAL, Dehradun
experience.role: Summer Vocational Trainee — Hyperspectral Remote Sensing
highlights: Implemented Linear Mixture Model (LMM) spectral unmixing and mixed-pixel classifiers (SAM/SCM) in C++ using Eigen for matrix ops.
Built training/feature pipelines and produced class-proportion maps (Washington DC Mall HYDICE dataset).
Optimized Spectral Angular Mapper/Spectral Correlation Mapper workflows; streamlined analysis time with vectorized routines.
